summary:
My name is Bart van Tricht, currently employed by Icertis, a SaaS company and Unicorn (as well as Centaur) start-up that provides AI infused Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) software to Enterprise customers. In the role of Senior Program Manager, I manage multiple end-to-end CLM, AI and Sourcing implementations as well as business transformations at key accounts, such as Airbus SE, Daimler AG, and Continental AG. Experienced in leading projects using Waterfall, Agile/SAFe and Hybrid models, both with and without a Scrum framework. Focused on ensuring Customer-centric implementations, with a short Time-to-Value (TTV) and high Customer Adoption Value (CAV). Any resulting account expansions are also facilitated.

My prior job experiences encompass Lead Functional Consultant, Product Owner, Subject Matter Expert, Business Process Analyst and Project Management roles. At the intersection of Content, Project- and People's management, my strengths become most visible.

Before Icertis, I worked as a Global Product Owner for Jacobs Douwe Egberts the second biggest coffee company in the world, where I was responsible for the Rebates, Billing & Invoicing as well as CLM applications. Moreover, as part of the Quote-to-Cash core team I helped design, build, test and implement a global front-end template for 9 countries (OpCos). This entailed creating a fully customized Salesforce and Apttus front-end and integrating it with a SAP ECC back-end. After implementation, this which was followed by a DevOps organizational structure and way-of-working (BAU) in which I held a similar role.

Earlier, I worked in the Finance and Controlling department at DB Schenker Rail Netherlands B.V., one of Europe's biggest railroad and logistics companies. Here my responsibilities ranged from Contract to Invoice management and Financial analysis, which helped me to obtain valuable business process insights.

At the beginning of my professional career, I held positions ranging from Junior Account manager (convention center) and Customer Care specialist (Dutch Tax agency), to Compliance officer (Credit card company). This was only preceded by my graduation with honors (Cum Laude) from Utrecht University in 2008. Here I hold a Master of Arts degree for a multidisciplinary studies. All of which prepared me for a career in project management in which high adaptability to content & circumstance, critical thinking, and problem solving skills, are key competencies.

awards.title: Shortlisted for the Theodore Roosevelt American History Award (TRAHA) 2009
awards.description: Every year the RIAS presents the Theodore Roosevelt American History Award (TRAHA) for the best Master's  thesis written by a graduate student at a Dutch university on an American history topic. I had the honor to be among the short-listed the American History Award in 2009. for the best master thesis with the U.S.A. as a subject.

projects.title: Airbus SE- Icertis Contract-centric Sourcing Implementation Project (Phase 1)
projects.description: Airbus has selected the Icertis Contract Management (ICM) platform and the ICM Sourcing application built on the ICM platform, to be the source-to-contract solution for its direct sourcing and contracting across its Commercial Aircraft, Helicopters, Defence and Space Divisions. By putting contracts at the center of sourcing, Airbus will be able to digitally optimize vendor relationships, accelerate commercial negotiations, and increase compliance.

Finance Director at Hilton Foods Holland

projects.title: JDE Professional Global: Salesforce-Apttus Implementation & Digital Transformation Project
projects.description: Project Kauri reached across JDE worldwide, particularly but not exclusively in the Professional business, to transform the way JDE works. The project implemented a new, globally harmonized set of business processes, alongside a SAP backbone and (for Professional) two cutting edge cloud-based systems in sales and operations (Apttus and Salesforce). The project touched almost every dedicated Professional business unit over a period of 2,5 years, as well as Retail businesses including Brazil, New Zealand and Norway. As a result of Project Kauri, Retail has achieved the last step in the vision to bring all countries onto one master system across the globe. For Professional the project has not only unlocked more data-driven insights for the business, but also provided JDE's customers with a 21st century experience, and enabled associates to focus on value creation rather than administration.

profile_positions.description:
Senior Business Process Specialist, responsible for a team of 6 specialists who handled invoicing, consumption based billing, rebates and price indexations for JDE Professional Netherlands. De facto team lead for 1 year.

In addition, as a Project Specialist, I both led and participated in various standardization and optimization projects. Improving business processes, such as Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM), Tender Management, Rebate and Approval Management at JDEP NL via IT and non-IT solutions.
